title: Studio Designs Deluxe Craft Station, Top Adjustable Drafting Table Craft Table Drawing Desk Hobby Table Writing Desk Studio Desk with Drawers, 36''W x 24''D, Black/White
description: Studio Designs' Deluxe Craft Station features a comfortably large work surface and a place to keep all of your various supplies. The table top with its adjustable work desk is great for drafting, drawing, or crafting on its large work surface. The table top easily adjusts in angle up to 40 degrees - just pull the top of the table up to the desired height and it locks into place, useful even as a portable office desk. 4 accessory side trays and 3 slide-out drawers are available for storage. Also includes a 24'' pencil ledge that slides up and locks into place when needed, as well as a cup holder and metal frame holder with drip tray (for glue gun, paint, etc.). Four wheel casters with dual locking make for a secure, mobile work station. Main work surface: 36''W x 24''D. Overall Dimensions: 41''w x 24''D x 30.5''-45.25''H.
